Welcome to AARUNYA

This portfolio is created for the course Algorithmic Problem Solving.

It showcases creativity, teamwork, and our ability to design beautiful and functional web-based projects.

What is the course about?

Design and analysis of algorithms is the foundation of computer science. It explores natural patterns, inspires computational logic, and builds strong analytical thinking and problem-solving strategies.

üîó

What data structures and algorithms have you studied?

Arrays, strings, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, tries, skip lists‚Äîeach structure teaches a new way to organize data and solve problems beautifully and efficiently.

‚öôÔ∏è

How does the course connect to real-time applications?

Algorithms guide GPS routes, sort e-commerce data, power search engines, secure networks, and personalize user experiences. They silently shape the digital world around us.
